1011001010010011 1100001011010111 1 -> sum: 0111010101101011, cout: 1
1110000000010000 0011010101101001 1 -> sum: 0001010101111010, cout: 1
1011110000010110 0011011011000001 0 -> sum: 1111001011010111, cout: 0
1111100111011000 0000011011010010 1 -> sum: 0000000010101011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
